name: Ogre Ramsey's Kitchen (AR Game)
description:
"-What are you?! 

-An ogre snadwich!"

Welcome to the chef Ogre Ramsey's Kitchen! Cook the best dishes for the diners and try not the get hit by the main chef, or worst! Get fired. Interact with your environment, cut, cook and plate the meals before the time is over.

Do yout best!
